data.name: Thorny Flower
data.detailed_description:
ðŸ’˜CHECK THIS OUT!ðŸ’˜

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1571820/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1778330/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1870310/


About the Game

â—†Story
All men are the same.
They thought that by being on top of me, by penetrating me, they would own me and that I would depend on them.
It was exactly the opposite.
I could moan and groan in bed, cater to every kink, whisper in their ears that they were my only one.
But it was just a game, an exchange game in which they gave me what I wanted and I gave them what they wanted.
And I had never seen anything wrong with that.

Baili, my only friend, never understood me, but never left me either.
She was the only person in the world who was genuinely kind to me.
Even though she always looked like she had something to tell me.

As I made my way into the civil service, meeting famous politicians, businessmen and young talents, and making deals over and over again, I should have been getting closer to the life I wanted, but why was I feeling more and more empty and the world around me was getting murkier?

To add insult to injury, the horrible memories of what had happened to me, which I had sealed up in my mind, came back to haunt me like a beast when I was defenseless...

â—†Gameplay Instructions (will open in the future)
A first-person POV AVG where the player takes on the role of the heroine, Yoshiro, and navigates between different men.
There are multiple options to choose from, each of which affects the way the characters around think about the heroine and, in turn, the final outcome.
These seemingly ordinary choices may also lead the player to a different perspective on the story, leading to a new world.

data.short_description: Beautiful flowers usually have thorns. In order to get everything she wanted, the beautiful Yoshiro â€˜made dealsâ€™ over and over again with different men. As long as someone who could provide for her wanted her, she would give them everything they desired, except her heartâ€¦
data.supported_languages:
Traditional Chinese, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese*, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Latin America, Vietnamese, Korean, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work. The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, sexual assault/non-consensual sex, drug/alcohol abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
